titles.title: We have laboured in the vineyard from

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We have laboured in the vineyard from
dawn to setting sun,
Counting me forever ready until our Lord
shall come.
When our work on earth is over and
every knee shall bow,
I want to be found ready with my hand
upon the plough.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Keep your hand on the gospel plough.
Heaven's shining goal is waiting now.
Keep pressing on; don't look back now.
Keep your hand on the gospel plough.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We plough the fields with patience waitin'
for the harvest time.
Sowin' seeds of salvation until the
laying by.
Looking forward to the reaping we must
be steadfast somehow.
With our eyes upon the Master and our
hands upon the plough.
